code.html:
{heading}

{subheading}

{#each tiers as tier, tier_index}

{tier.title}

{tier.price.numerator} {tier.price.denominator}
{@html tier.description.html}
    {#each tier.features as { item, icon }, feature_index}
  • {item}
    • {/each}
{#if tier.link.label} {tier.link.label} {/if}
{/each}
